Superpowers Corp | Full Stack Developer | Boulder/Denver preferred, remote possible | http://www.superpowerscorp.com/

Tech: Elm, Horizon, NodeJS, RethinkDB. Code is Elm where possible, JS where necessary.

We are a small early-stage startup. We are looking for an experienced developer to join our tight-knit team on a contract or permanent basis to help us execute on our mission of building software that gives people super powers through automation and machine intelligence.

Experience with the technologies in our stack and functional programming would both be great but what we really care about is building a team of smart people who love building software and are always learning.

If that's you, we want to hear from you at jobs@superpowerscorp.com.
